channel.description: CC 410 - Week 4 Wrapping Up 9/13 - Documentation, Testing, UML 9/13 - Doc & Testing Example 9/13 - Restaurant 2 This Week 9/20 - Inheritance & Polymorphism 9/20 - Inheritance Example Start - Stop - Continue Survey Some Final Project Time Next Week 9/27 - Debugging & Logging 9/27 - Lambda Expressions 9/27 - Debugging & Logging Example 9/27 - Restaurant 3 9/27 - Final Project 2 Milestone 3 All General Requirements Add Inheritance Refactor Classes New Unit Tests Update UML Diagram ~1500 LOC Feedback Welcome!
